response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity. Our product, which is not only a testament to innovation but also a symbol of excellence, is being offered to you at a special introductory price. Given its immense value to us and considering its worth to you stands at $800,000, I propose to make it available to you for $950,000. This offer encapsulates our commitment to providing exceptional value while ensuring a fair return on our investment. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of bringing this remarkable product into your possession.", "product_price": 950000}
